title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7425.7 - Change of religion
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7425.7 - Change of religion

State Regulations

Residents who are under the age of 18 years shall be
permitted to change their religious affiliation only with the consent of the
resident's parent or legal guardian, and upon application to the Bureau of

Ministerial Services. Residents over the age of 18 years shall be permitted to
change their religious affiliation upon application to the Bureau of

Ministerial Services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7425.7

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
